name: Neverending Posse
description:
Play as the sinister Masked Bandit, on the run from a never-ending posse hell bent on taking you down. As you desperately search for your train out of there, you hope you can get enough of a bribe together to convince the train driver to harbour a fugitive.

Good luck!

v1.2- Had some time to do some bug fixes: 

Cowboy movement now smoother when level with the Bandit,

Title screen works when rebooting from game over or win screen

Smoother edges on the rivers and lakes

Cactus and cow skulls now have shadow, shouldn't spawn under some of the scenery elements (need to totally fix this at a later date)
